text:
Hi,
My custom modules keep disappear from design tools, is there any problem with HubSpot design tools, It has happened with me a lot times, I don't know if there's anything I'm missing out or doing it wrong.
Can you send me a message with a link to your HubSpot portal along with the name of one of the modules that you’ve created but have had disappear?

Just to recap on the issue - the module had been deleted. Recently deleted files in the Design Manager can be viewed/ restored by selecting ‘View > Recently edited files’  in the left sidebar. Hovering over any files will give an option to restore the file.
